summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of Kantik Tracks Studio worship resources platform. Backend APIs are 100% functional (21/21 tests passed). Frontend core functionality works with beautiful French UI, but has Select component configuration issues causing JavaScript errors in catalog filters.

ui_bugs.issue: Select.Item components have empty string value props causing React runtime errors
ui_bugs.error_details: A <Select.Item /> must have a value prop that is not an empty string. This is because the Select value can be set to an empty string to clear the selection and show the placeholder.

ui_bugs.issue: Featured songs may not be properly visible on homepage scroll

integration_issues.issue: JavaScript errors prevent smooth operation of dropdown filters

passed_tests: Backend API health check (100% success rate - 21/21 tests)
Homepage loads with beautiful French UI and hero section
Admin login flow (admin@kantik.ht / admin123) working perfectly
Admin dashboard accessible with all 4 tabs (Overview, Songs, Payments, Users)
Song detail page loads correctly with French content
Pricing page displays 3 plans in French (Gratuit, Standard 500 HTG, Ã‰quipe 2000 HTG)
Songs management in admin panel (10 songs displayed)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix Select component configuration in catalog filters - ensure Select.Item components have proper non-empty string value props. The error occurs in language, tier, and sort filter dropdowns. Also verify featured songs section visibility on homepage.
